name: TerrorRun
description:
When visiting a loved ones grave, a dense fog creeps over you. You dont know why, but you must run...

Your goal is to go as far as you can, dont let the monster catch you or the game is over. Use spacebar to jump over incoming obstacles and collect tokens to boost your final score. 

Aquire knowledge to understand the monster and become the chaser yourself. While fleeing, the monster will drop mysterious orbs. Collect enough of them and the monster will move further away from you.

Other powerups might help you run faster temporarily and make you invincible.

Take a break by going on rooftops but be careful when going underground, you might encounter extra threats.

Controls: 

To jump press "spacebar"
